body.name: Feiasia Portable Monitor Extremely Slim&Lightweight 15.6 Inch 1080P USB-C Laptop HDMI Computer Display Gaming Monitor with Smart Cover&Speakers Travel Monitor for PC Mac Phone Switch
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 3 hrs 2 mins
features: 【Born for Portable】It is probably one of the lightest and thinnest Portable Monitors on the market, the thickest edge is only 0.39 inch and weighs 1.25 pounds，Absolutely made for extending your screen or playing games on business trip, travel, or home entertainment

【HDR Full HD 1080P Screen】 HDR technology can show more details in the dark and bright areas of the image. IPS 178° wide view screen, You can not only use it to play games and watch movies in bed, but also to travel and go out to work

【Plug and Play】 It doesn’t require any driver installation. Two Type-C port, Upper Type-C(DP Compatible) support connect and reverse charging with cell phones, the lower Type-C for power, no worry about short battery life when playing games on the phone

【Compatible Devices】 Equipped with Type-C data port, USB Type C charge port, mini HDMI port and micro USB port make it compatible for laptops, computers, smart phones, PS3 / PS4/PS5, XBOX, Raspberry Pi, SLR camera, CCTV or Switch and Mouse, Keyboard, portable power bank to play business presentations, games, videos, TV series, photos, etc

【Package Include】 Feiasia 15.6” Portable Monitor x1, Original Monitor Case x1, Cables x3(Mini HDMI to HDMI, Type-C to Type-C, USB to Type-C) User Manual x1, Charging Head x 1 and 356 days screen warranty

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Note: 1. Please check if the USB-C port of your devices is a full-featured port（can transfer audio and video). If it is only for charging, it will not be available. 2. Portable monitor 15 inch doesn't have a built-in battery and requires a power supply. Please make sure the connected device has enough power output through the USB-C port, or you need to connect external power by charging Cable (Included). -- Type-C connection: Your Type-C device will auto charge for the monitor, but if the Type-C device NOT enough battery, you need to connect the power supply to charge the Type-C monitor by Type-C cable (Included). -- HDMI connection: when you connect this portable HDMI monitor to your device with HDMI cable, you need to connect the power supply to charge the monitor by Type-C cable (Included).

Specifications Pro Portable Monitor Screen size: 15.6 inches Resolution ratio: 1920x1080 Panel Type: IPS HDR Screen Ratio: 16:9 Backlight Type: LCD Contrast: 1000:1 Mounting type: desk mount, portable, wall mount Refresh rate base: 60Hz Increase Your Productivity & Game Pleasures Support Multiple Devices HUAWEI: (Mate10, Mate10Pro, Mate20, P20, P20Pro, Mate20X, P30, P30Pro, MateRS, Mate30, P20RS, HonorV20)Samsung: (S8, S8+, S9, S9+,S10, S10+, Note8, Note9)Razer: (Razer Phone, Razer Phone 2）OnePlus: (OnePlus 7, 7Pro, 7T)Sony: ( XPeria 1(J9110), XPeria 5, XPeria XZ3)Tips: iPhone is not supported Apple: (MacBook12”, MacBook Pro, MacBook Air, ipad Pro 2018, Mac mini)HUAWEI： (MateBook, MateBook X, MateBook X Pro, MateBook E, MateBook D, MateBook 13)HP：(Pavilion X2, EliteBook Folio G1, Envy 13, HP Spectre 13, OMEN 4)ASUS: (Zen book, U321Series, U4100, ROG Series, Deluxe 3, Deluxe 3Pro, Deluxe X Series)Lenovo： ( Yoga5 Pro, Thinkpad X1 Carbon2017, Miix720，ThinkPad-X 1, Y7000, Y7000, Y9000) PS3 /PS4/PS5XBOX ONESWITCHmore game devices

For smartphone One USB C cable connection for most for Android cellphone(not iphone) You can expand your phone screen to work or play. Note: Please check if the Type C of your phone is a full-featured Type C port. If it is just a Type C for charging, it will not be available. And check if your phone have enough power output, or it requires an adapter to support power. For working Feiasia portable monitor supports most of laptop and PC models on the market with usb-c cable or mini HDMI cable. you can use the monitor as the same screen or you can also add a second or third screen to your device to increase productivity Work easily and don't take up too much space on your desk For Gaming&Amusement As a travel portable monitor, Feiasia spupports most of gaming devices: Switch, X-Box, PS3/4/5, digital cameras, Raspberry Pi etc... You can easily take it anywhere and use it without having to go through the installation process Easy to use, Plug and play!

Built-in double speakers Feiasia portable monitor built-in dual stereo speakers. It allows you to continue to have sound while using the same screen or split screen Monitor parts list 1x Feiasia 15.6 inch portable monitor 1x original monitor stand case 1x power adapter 1x usb to usb-c cable 1x usb-c to usb-c cable 1x mini HDMI cable Slim&Portable design It is probably one of the lightest and thinnest Portable Monitors on the market, the thickest edge is only 0.39 inch and weighs 1.25 pounds，Absolutely made for extending your screen or playing games on business trip, travel, or home entertainment

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value for price
reviews.reviewText: Great secondary monitor, includes a folding stand up case, as you can see in the picture, is exactly 15.4" as my laptop, extra lightweight for easy portability, you can connect it to the laptop only using the usb cable included, includes a usb A to C, C to C and an HDMI, also a charger. Excelent overall, recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works With My MacBook!
reviews.reviewText: Perfect as a 2nd screen! Portable and easy to attach. The price was right also.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for a mobile office
reviews.reviewText: This monitor was perfect for working in a makeshift office! I was working in an office that didn’t have monitor set up in this made working for my laptop 1 million times better. The display is beautiful and crisp. It’s very lightweight and it worked perfectly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very easy to use. Just plug in and go! Looking forward to actually doing some work on it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This works great for viewing my class as I work on my laptop to finish homework.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for fighting games
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Advantages :Price, response speed, thinness, looks bigger than expecteddisadvantage :Sound: High notes are okay, but there is no grand feeling (you can't expect great sound in this price range)The monitor I am currently using has a slow response time for fighting games like Tekken, so I needed a second monitor. Fighting games usually only support up to 60fps, so anything above 60hz is meaningless, so I didn't experience much inconvenience with this product. However, due to the nature of fighting games, it is advantageous to have no input lag, but I did not feel that at all while using this monitor. However, I don't know what it will be like for FPS games such as Overwatch, Battlegrounds, and Fort Nite.Other than that, there are a few things that are a bit disappointing, but considering the price, I'm quite satisfied. So I will repurchase this product or recommend it to my friends.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gift for my brother
reviews.reviewText: He said he was super happy with it! He games on it and uses it as a dual screen for editing videos and so far so great! It’s super lightweight and the box it came in made it look super premium.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great monitor but folio stand is a piece of junk. Hoping support can help.
reviews.reviewText: This monitor seems like a really, really good deal. I can't confirm its longevity yet because I've only had it for 2 days but so far it's been great. 1080p, USB power passthrough for device charging, multiple ports, and gets bright enough for indoor use. The folio cover is really, really bad. It doesn't hold up the tablet at all unless you sit it basically straight up but that's alright. I use it at that angle for school and I keep my bluetooth keyboard in front of it to hold it up anyway. The fact that it even supports AMD freesync, for whatever reason, it's kinda neat too.***WORD OF WARNING***If you are wanting to use this with a tablet such as an iPad Pro or, in my case, a Samsung Galaxy Tab S7+, just know that both tablets aren't capable of outputting enough power through the USB-C port to keep the monitor on so you will want to power the monitor first and then connect your screen. Obviously this isn't the screen manufacturer's fault but it's still something of note. If you see your iPad or Galaxy Tab flickering or failing to launch certain tasks, power the monitor first. Works great after that. I have no problems with this setup as I always have my tablet plugged in for long study sessions anyway. I'm sure on a regular laptop it might work better. Haven't tested any Surface Pro's yet to see if they can manage it.UPDATE: After about 2 months the magnets on the folio cover have given up. The folio cover no longer holds the monitor up most of the time. I can prop it up using the friction of the cover but it falls over eventually. Going to see if they can send me a replacement folio and may update my score depending on what they say.UPDATE 2: They sent me another folio and it works great. Magnets are much stronger than the original one ever was when, even when it was brand new. I'm going to give them 4 out of 5 stars because the folio is clearly a quality problem that many others in the reviews have complained about but it's not nearly enough for me to not like this monitor. It's fantastic, especially for the price. Just really don't like the folio.
